long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MIU Auto Evaluation Assistant is designed to streamline the process of evaluating instructors on online platforms. This user-friendly tool automates the repetitive task of rating instructors by clicking through evaluation forms, saving valuable time for educators and administrators.
